casebody.data:
Colin BOWER, on His Own Behalf and as Guardian and Legal Custodian of His Minor Children, N and R, petitioner,
v.
EGYPTAIR AIRLINES. No. 13-780. Supreme Court of the United States April 7, 2014. Case below, 731 F.3d 85 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit denied.
